scripts.build: npx -p wabt wat2wasm main.wat -o out/main.wasm && npx -p wabt wat2wasm main.wat -o out/main.html && npx -p wabt wat2wasm main.wat -o out/main.zip
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run validate && npm run execute

wasmStudio.name: Hello World in C
wasmStudio.description:
# Hello World in C

Print \`Hello World\` using a minimal POSIX API.
Level: *Advanced*
Topics: Low-Level, Memory, Linux, System Calls
